body_html: Hi @gasse, I also want to help you to make your Graph Convolutional Networks work with SparseTensor. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be great if you can comment on places that needs the sparse ops, like the ones you mentioned already: mm, max, softmax.
body_text: Hi @gasse, I also want to help you to make your Graph Convolutional Networks work with SparseTensor. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be great if you can comment on places that needs the sparse ops, like the ones you mentioned already: mm, max, softmax.
body: Hi @gasse, I also want to help you to make your Graph Convolutional Networks work with SparseTensor. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be great if you can comment on places that needs the sparse ops, like the ones you mentioned already: `mm`, `max`, `softmax`.
